mapper.select: SELECT A.TechGroupNo AS TECH_GROUP_NO , A.TechGroupNm AS TECH_GROUP_NM , B.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , CONCAT('/tech/', B.TechFieldNo) AS URL FROM PATENT.TechGroup A , PATENT.TechField B WHERE A.TechGroupNo = B.TechGroupNo AND A.TechGroupNo < 7

SELECT A.TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , A.TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , B.TechItemNo AS TECH_ITEM_NO , B.TechItemNm AS TECH_ITEM_NM FROM PATENT.TechField A , PATENT.TechItem B WHERE A.TechFieldNo = B.TechFieldNo AND A.TechFieldNo = #{techFieldNo }
SELECT TechFieldNo AS TECH_FIELD_NO , TechFieldNm AS TECH_FIELD_NM , TechFieldType AS TECH_FIELD_TYPE FROM PATENT.TechField A WHERE TechGroupNo = 7
